foreignData.name: Wildpfad
foreignData.text:
Sowie der Wildpfad ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Gebirge- oder eine Wald-Karte aus deiner Hand offen vorzeigen. Falls du dies nicht tust, kommt der Wildpfad getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {R} oder {G}.

foreignData.name: Rastro de presas
foreignData.text:
En cuanto el Rastro de presas entre al campo de batalla, puedes mostrar una carta de montaña o bosque de tu mano. Si no lo haces, el Rastro de presas entra al campo de batalla girado.
{T}: Agrega {R} o {G} a tu reserva de maná.

foreignData.name: Piste du gibier
foreignData.text:
Au moment où la Piste du gibier arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez révéler une carte de montagne ou de forêt de votre main. Si vous ne le faites pas, la Piste du gibier arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G} à votre réserve.

foreignData.name: Pista della Preda
foreignData.text:
Mentre la Pista della Preda entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi rivelare una carta Montagna o Foresta dalla tua mano. Se non lo fai, la Pista della Preda entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignData.name: 獲物道
foreignData.text:
獲物道が戦場に出るに際し、あなたはあなたの手札から山・カード１枚か森・カード１枚を公開してもよい。そうしないなら、獲物道はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{R}か{G}を加える。

foreignData.name: 사냥감의 흔적
foreignData.text:
사냥감의 흔적이 전장에 들어오면서, 당신의 손에 있는 산 또는 숲 카드 한 장을 공개할 수 있다. 그러지 않으면, 사냥감의 흔적은 탭된 상태로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {R} 또는 {G}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.

foreignData.name: Trilha de Caça
foreignData.text:
Conforme Trilha de Caça entra no campo de batalha, você pode revelar um card de Montanha ou Floresta de sua mão. Se não fizer isso, Trilha de Caça entrará no campo de batalha virada.
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {G} à sua reserva de mana.

foreignData.name: Звериная Тропа
foreignData.text:
При выходе Звериной Тропы на поле битвы вы можете показать карту Горы или Леса из вашей руки. Если вы этого не делаете, Звериная Тропа выходит на поле битвы повернутой.
{T}: добавьте {R} или {G} в ваше хранилище маны.

foreignData.name: 狩猎小径
foreignData.text:
于狩猎小径进战场时，你可以从你手上展示一张山脉或树林牌。如果你未如此作，狩猎小径须横置进战场。
{T}：加{R}或{G}到你的法术力池中。

foreignData.name: 狩獵小徑
foreignData.text:
於狩獵小徑進戰場時，你可以從你手上展示一張山脈或樹林牌。如果你未如此作，狩獵小徑須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{R}或{G}到你的魔法力池中。

name: Game Trail
originalText:
As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: You may reveal any land card with either or both of the appropriate subtypes. It doesn't have to be a basic land. For example, you could reveal Canopy Vista from the Battle for Zendikar set to satisfy the ability of Game Trail.

Lands don't have a subtype just because they can produce mana of the corresponding color. Game Trail itself is neither a Mountain nor a Forest, even though it produces red and green mana, so you can't reveal one to satisfy the ability of another.
If a Mountain or Forest is entering the battlefield from your hand at the same time as Game Trail, you may reveal the other land to have Game Trail enter untapped.
If an effect instructs you to put Game Trail onto the battlefield tapped, it will still enter the battlefield tapped even if you reveal a land card from your hand.

text:
As Game Trail enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Game Trail enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
